# Sandeep M. Nayak, MD

Sandeep M. Nayak, MD, is an Assistant Professor of Psychiatry at Johns Hopkins and Medical Director of the Center for Psychedelic & Consciousness Research. He joined the lab in 2020, completed a postdoctoral fellowship with Roland Griffiths, PhD, and then transitioned to faculty. Dr. Nayak is PI on BIPOD, a randomized clinical trial of psilocybin for opioid use disorder, a pilot study of psilocybin for PTSD, and a microdosing safety study. His interests include clinical applications of psychedelics, Bayesian statistics, clinical-trial methodology, belief change, and psychedelic anthropology. He is also a practicing psychiatrist.
